trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> objects encapsulate security decisions about an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>objetos encapsulam decisões de segurança sobre um aplicativo.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>

trans-unit.source: Adds an element to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um elemento à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> object is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>objeto é adicionado ao final da coleção.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>

trans-unit.source: To remove an application trust that you previously added, use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para remover uma relação de confiança do aplicativo que você adicionou anteriormente, use o <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.Remove%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> object to add.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> objeto a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The index at which the new element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: O índice no qual o novo elemento foi inserido.

trans-unit.source: trust is .
trans-unit.target: trustis .

trans-unit.source: The property of the specified in trust is .
trans-unit.target: The property of the specified in trust is .

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> array to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos do <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> matriz ao final da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> objects contained in the `trusts` array are appended to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>objetos contidos na `trusts` matriz são acrescentados ao final da coleção.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>

trans-unit.source: To remove a range of application trusts that you previously added, use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.RemoveRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para remover um intervalo de confiança do aplicativo que você adicionou anteriormente, use o <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.RemoveRange%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.RemoveRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> containing the objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> que contém os objetos para adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: trusts is .
trans-unit.target: trustsis .

trans-unit.source: The property of an specified in trust is .
trans-unit.target: The property of an specified in trust is .

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos do <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"> </xref> ao final da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> objects contained in `trusts` are appended to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>objetos contidos no `trusts` são acrescentados ao final da coleção.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>

trans-unit.source: You can use the AddRange method to quickly add another collection of application trust objects to the collection instead of manually adding each application trust to the collection using the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o método AddRange rapidamente adicionar outra coleção de objetos de confiança do aplicativo na coleção em vez de adicionar manualmente cada relação de confiança do aplicativo para a coleção usando o <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove a range of application trusts that you previously added, use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.RemoveRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para remover um intervalo de confiança do aplicativo que você adicionou anteriormente, use o <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.RemoveRange%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.RemoveRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref> containing the objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"> </xref> que contém os objetos para adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: trusts is .
trans-unit.target: trustsis .

trans-unit.source: The property of an specified in trust is .
trans-unit.target: The property of an specified in trust is .

trans-unit.source: Removes all the application trusts from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as relações de confiança do aplicativo da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> in the collection is identified by its <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.ApplicationIdentity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>na coleção é identificado pelo seu <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.ApplicationIdentity%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.ApplicationIdentity%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.ApplicationIdentity%2A> property for any <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> object in the collection is `null`, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.ApplicationIdentity%2A>propriedade para qualquer <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>objeto na coleção é `null`, uma <xref:System.ArgumentException>é gerada.</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.ApplicationIdentity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.ApplicationIdentity*> property of an item in the collection is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.ApplicationIdentity*>é de propriedade de um item na coleção <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.ApplicationIdentity*>

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire collection to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia toda a coleção para uma matriz unidimensional compatível, iniciando no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array of type <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz unidimensional do tipo <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> que é o destino dos elementos copiados da coleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `array` no qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than the lower bound of array.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que o limite inferior de array.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayé multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o número de elementos no é maior que o espaço disponível do index até o final do destino array.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de itens contidos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of items contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de itens contidos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the application trusts in the collection that match the specified application identity.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as relações de confiança de aplicativo na coleção que correspondem à identidade do aplicativo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The application trust is optionally selected by an exact version match, based on the value of the `versionMatch` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A relação de confiança do aplicativo é selecionada opcionalmente por uma correspondência de versão exata, com base no valor da `versionMatch` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"></xref> object describing the application to find.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"> </xref> objeto que descreve o aplicativo a ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationVersionMatch"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationVersionMatch"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref> containing all matching <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"> </xref> que contém toda a correspondência <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that can be used to iterate over the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um objeto que pode ser usado para iterar na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> interface that allows you to move within a collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator>implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>interface que permite que você mova dentro de uma coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>apontada propriedade para obter o item atualmente na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para mover para o próximo item na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to its initial position.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para mover o enumerador como sua posição inicial.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After you create the enumerator, or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to reposition the enumerator to the start of the collection, you must then call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to position the enumerator to the first item.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Depois de criar o enumerador, ou usar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para reposicionar no início da coleção, o enumerador, em seguida, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para posicionar o enumerador para o primeiro item.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o item é representado pelo <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator"></xref> that can be used to iterate over the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator"> </xref> que pode ser usado para iterar na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso à coleção é sincronizado (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> object located at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> objeto localizado no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to get a <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> object from the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para obter um <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>de objeto o <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection>no índice especificado.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice com base em zero do objeto na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: index is greater than or equal to the count of objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: indexé maior que ou igual à contagem de objetos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: index is negative.
trans-unit.target: indexé negativo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> object for the specified application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> objeto para o aplicativo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.ApplicationIdentity%2A> property of each <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> object in the collection is examined for a <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.FullName%2A> property value that matches the application specified by the `appFullName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.ApplicationIdentity%2A>propriedade de cada <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>objeto na coleção é examinado para um <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.FullName%2A>que descreva o aplicativo especificado pelo valor da propriedade de `appFullName` parâmetro.</xref:System.ApplicationIdentity.FullName%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust.ApplicationIdentity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The full name of the application.
trans-unit.target: O nome completo do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> object for the specified application, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the object cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> objeto para o aplicativo especificado, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o objeto não pode ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified application trust from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove a relação de confiança do aplicativo especificado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The entire collection is searched, and all instances of the specified application trust are removed.
trans-unit.target: Toda a coleção é pesquisada, e todas as instâncias da relação de confiança do aplicativo especificado são removidas.

trans-unit.source: The objects that follow the removed objects move up to occupy the vacated positions.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos que siga os objetos removidos mover para cima para ocupar as posições vazias.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the objects that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices de objetos que são movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> object to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> objeto a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: trust is .
trans-unit.target: trustis .

trans-unit.source: The property of the object specified by trust is .
trans-unit.target: O propriedade o o objeto especificado por trust é .

trans-unit.source: Removes all application trust objects that match the specified criteria from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os objetos de confiança do aplicativo que correspondem aos critérios especificados da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The application trust can be identified by an exact version match, dependent upon the value of the `versionMatch` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A relação de confiança do aplicativo pode ser identificada por uma correspondência exata de versão, depende do valor da `versionMatch` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.Find%2A> method is used to locate all matching application trusts, and the matching items are removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.Find%2A>método é usado para localizar a correspondência de todas as relações de confiança do aplicativo e os itens correspondentes são removidos da coleção.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection.Find%2A>

trans-unit.source: The objects that follow the removed objects move up to occupy the vacated positions.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos que siga os objetos removidos mover para cima para ocupar as posições vazias.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the objects that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices de objetos que são movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> object to be removed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> objeto a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationVersionMatch"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationVersionMatch"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Removes the application trust objects in the specified array from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove a coleção de objetos de confiança do aplicativo na matriz especificada.

trans-unit.source: The objects that follow the removed objects move up to occupy the vacated positions.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos que siga os objetos removidos mover para cima para ocupar as posições vazias.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the objects that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices de objetos que são movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array of type <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> that contains items to be removed from the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz unidimensional de tipo <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> que contém itens a ser removido da coleção atual.

trans-unit.source: trusts is .
trans-unit.target: trustsis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the application trust objects in the specified collection from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove os objetos de confiança do aplicativo na coleção especificada da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The objects that follow the removed objects move up to occupy the vacated positions.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos que siga os objetos removidos mover para cima para ocupar as posições vazias.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the objects that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices de objetos que são movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref> that contains items to be removed from the currentcollection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"> </xref> que contém os itens a serem removidos do currentcollection.

trans-unit.source: trusts is .
trans-unit.target: trustsis .

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns the current application trust object.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão retorna o objeto de confiança do aplicativo atual.

trans-unit.source: The object to use to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> to the specified <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified <xref:System.Array> index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os elementos do <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>especificado <xref:System.Array>, iniciando em especificado <xref:System.Array>índice.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos elementos copiados de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>devem ter a indexação com base em zero.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `array` no qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayé multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: o número de elementos na origem - ou - é maior que o espaço disponível do index até o final do destino array.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador que itera pela coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>que pode ser usado para iterar pela coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>
